embed.error:
You are missing the `ADMINISTRATOR` permission!
Please contact an administrator to change the language!

embed.title: Info
embed.description: **Would You** is a fun little bot for every server. Our mission is it to keep discord servers active by giving them a bunch of useless and useful superpowers to start a conversation.

Fields.name: **My Commands**
Fields.value:
`/wouldyou` -Start a discussion about superpowers
`/ping` - Pong!
`/language` - Change the language of this server
`/help` - Shows this info
